meanings.definition: The quality or state of being slim.
meanings.sent1: Her slimness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: I envy her natural slimness; she never has to worry about dieting.
meanings.sent3: The cat's slimness allowed it to squeeze through the narrow gap in the fence.
meanings.sent4: The slimness of the chances of winning the lottery didn't deter him from buying a ticket.
meanings.sent5: The model's slimness was accentuated by the flowing dress she wore on the runway.

meanings.definition: A slender or thin physical appearance.
meanings.sent1: The slimness of the tree branches made them sway gracefully in the wind.
meanings.sent2: She maintained her slimness by eating healthily and exercising regularly.
meanings.sent3: The slimness of the thread made it difficult to thread through the tiny needle.
meanings.sent4: The slimness of the chances of success in the project didn't deter her determination.
meanings.sent5: His slimness was evident in the way his clothes hung loosely on his frame.
